channel.title: Need help... Sparkle Emote Thingy when you get lvl
channel.description:
How do you add that emotion.. The sparkles that show up over a characters head when a level is granted...
Im using Testscape.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 09:19:50 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Need help... Sparkle Emote Thingy when you get lvl
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

… the emote is 199 look for a tut to see where to put it

item.title: Need help... Sparkle Emote Thingy when you get lvl
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

yes you go to the case of the skill (in Testscape:)

case 20

This would be runecrafting in Testscape. Then you would add underneath the interfaces that pop up when you get a skill the void for animations. Otherwise; if this does not work, then go and put it next to the public void for skills leveling up. I hope I helped!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic
